pages.text: I've heard tales of a mysterious and powerful dragon guarding an island in an immense void. I know travel to other realms is possible, but the sum total of information on this creature I've found is little more than tall tales and passing rumour. I once spoke to a madman who claimed to know where to find this island, only to be taken to a random location in a forest.
The man claimed some sort of strange eye led him there. On the following page I've attached a sketch of this alleged creature's appearance. I hope I may one day learn more.
